TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sakur, title = Sakur, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sakur} }

S.FORM: Sakur Itiniay i Hualien Cen no Hualien ko Sakur a niyaro', 616 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,699 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 39% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 658 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 61% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,041 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis25%, 撒奇拉雅族8%, Bunun1%, Tayal1%, Truku3%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Sakor Itiniay i Hoalien Cen no Hoalien ko Sakor a niyaro', 616 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 1,699 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 39% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 658 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 61% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1,041 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis25%, 撒奇拉雅族8%, Bonon1%, Tayal1%, Troko3%, roma1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
